name: TankPit
description:
Tankpit is a remake of classic multiplayer tank game Battlefield which debuted on bonus.com in 1997. Choose your tank name, pick a troop color, and battle other players to earn ranks, awards, and a spot on the leaderboards. Registration is free and registered users can compete in regularly scheduled tournaments, as well as save their tank stats permanently.

For information on how to play, see "How to Play" on the lobby screen after choosing your tank name. Good luck on the field!
